content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.

Shubhathejassil maalaakhamaar
/tninne shushrooshippoo
Pulariyudikke srshdikallellaam
/taadyam ninne vandippoo.

Pethgomo-kellkkaname pulariyilen naadam-haale...
Praathhkaalatthil dhoopam vaykkumpoll
Doothanmaar vaanil-sthothram paadunnu
Paapam poondaarkkaayu -mochippindhoopam
Pattakkaareesha-nnarppicheedunnu
/thaaleluyyaa uhaaleluyyaa
Naathhaa! Yaachippin-saaphalyam nalka.

Oottungkal chenn-neerinnarththhichu
Shamaraayasthreeye-veendone! Sthothram
Neerangarththhichu-sthree thannillethum
Divyam paaneeyam-nee daanam cheythu haa...... Haa
Ninraktham moolam-lokam nee veendu

Dhanye! Maathaave!-ninnodullllanpaal
Paapatthin bhaaram-naathhan neekkatte
Nyaayattheerppingkal-paayikkaathamme!
Praarththhikkenam nee-ninputhran munpil-haa... Haa
Nin yaachippennum nyangallkkaalambam

Kanyaamegham bhoo-lokeshan thanne
Evvannam poonde-ennennodothename
Maalaakhaa mumpan-grabriyel chonnaan
Lokeshan naathhan-vaazha ninnullllil-haa... Haa...
Thaan thanne sathyam-vishvatthe veendon

Thannullllamkaiyil-pallllikkullllil nal
Peedham nirmmichon-mishihaaye! Sthothram
Nibiyar shleehanmaar-sahader siddhanmaa-
Rennee nikshepam-sookshichaanullllil-haa... Haa...
Ee divyaagaaram-sthhaapichon dhanyan

Ennodothenam-sahadenmaare! Kell
Entortthikkashda-ppaadellaamettu
Aa bhaagyam nethram-darshichittilla kettittilla.
Kaa-thullllaarnnittilla-haa....Haa...
Bhakthanmaarkkeeshan-nalkeedum sthhaanam

Maartthommaashleehaa!-ninneyormmicho
Raattinkoottatthe-kartthan kaakkunnu
Kandaalum ninne kondaadum koottam
Ninne nandikkum-mashihaaye vaazhtthum-haa...Haa...
Nin yaachippennum-sangkethasthhaanam

Vettam veenappoll-daaveedaamodaal
Devaagaaratthil-praarththhippaan poyi
Lokam veendone! Naathhaa!En vaakyam
Dhyaanam kanneere-nniva kaikkollllename-haa... Haa....
Nee nalkeedenam-paapatthin shaanti

Paapam cheyyaayvaan-vaathukkal neethi
Peredum peri-kaaval nilkkunnu
Than kaippenaayaal-cherkkum granthhatthil
Marthyanmaar krthyam-haa! Nirdaakshinyam haa... Haa
Sarvvaantavedee!-kaarunyam cheytha

Kartthaave! Nyangall-vaathil muttunnu
Neeyallo nalku-nnellaamellaarkkum
Chodichaal kittum -thedumpoll kaanum
Muttumpoll vaathil-bandham neengunnu-haa...Haa...
Vaathil kezhunnor-kkekunnon dhanyan

Vishvaasatthaale vaangippoyore
Praarththhichidumpo-llorttheedenam naam
Aashvaasam nithyam-praapicheedaanaayu
Thronosinmel pe-rorttheedenam naam haa..Haa
Jeevippikkunnon -naathhaa!Sthothram the!

Pethgomo:- daivatthin thiruvishdam pol
Praarththhanakallkkaayu vaanatthin
Vaathil thurakkum pularkaale
/tshushrooshakallettudayone!
/tyaachanakallkkuttharamarulli
/taathmaakkallkkekeedaname
Sharanamathum samrakshayathum

Irull mrthisaatthaanennivaye
Kalppanayaal paade neekki
/tkshithiye dyothippichone!
/tvalabhaage mevum thanayaa!
/tpraathhkaalatthirulokar
Sthuthi nin perkkaayarppichu

Thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
Moolam meleennaadhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondor vaayil thingum
/tshlomo chonnaan naathhan nin
Koode thannudayam ninnil.

Daasyatthin nibi haskeeyel
Darshakanayanatthaal kandaan
/tdaaveedin makall kanyakaye
/tkartthaavinnathbhuthakaramaam
/tdaivikadarshananirayaala-
Mmahitham roopam virachichaan.

Shlommoyannibiyannmaarkkum
Shlonmaayaashleehanmaarkkum
/tshlommo than naathhan thanne
/tsnehichoraam sahaderkkum
/tshlommo than santaanangall
Maruvum sabhayaallkkum shlommo.

Sahadenmaare! Samaratthil
Sahabhadanaayu ninnuthsaaham
/tningallkkarulliyoraanaathhan
/tsathyasneham thrkkanpaar-
/ttthaadarapoorvvam valuthaakki
Ningall thanperunaallukalle.

Maarthommaa! Neeyaarjichu
Vegam koodum pakshangall
/tvaanatthil paarippongi
/tprathidaanam nee kaikkollllum
/tnin sukrthatthaaludayone
Ethirelppaan nee chennetthum.

Naathhaa! Varanam nin raajyam
Vaanathileppol thiruvishdam
/tbhoolokatthilumaakaname
/tkadapaapangall pokkaname
/tdushdapareekshakalle neekki
Rakshikkaname nyangalle nee.

Moshdaave! Nee! Parudeesin
Shreshdathamuttum vellivaakki
/tkaattittharane jeevatharu
/tjaagaranam praarththhana nompodu
/tneethiyezhum kaazhchakallennee
Moonpaam phalamaarjikkatte.

Daivaathmajar naamaayeedaan
Namme sheelippichoraam
/tthaathanmaareyorkkenam
/tpunyam cheythorodoppam
/tnalkum daivatthin thanayan
Svargatthilavarkkaashvaasam.

Neechanmaarilasooya ninakkundaakaruthe haa....
Dushkkarmmikallil vairamathum
/tdaivatthil prathyaashayode cheyyuka nanma haa.....
/toozhiyil maruvitthirayuka nee vishvaasam

Praathhkaala-tthaadyam srshdikallandhathaye
Maayichone vandichevam keertthippoo
Sthothram the! Deveshaa!

Praavine vittu pulariyilaprallayatthin
Nilayariyaanaay
/tneethipriyanaakum noha
/tparamasamaadhaanakkuriyaay
Saitthila perikkonduthiri-
Chetthipadavathilapparava

Pularvellayathil praarththhippaan
Bhooshaanibi girishrmgatthil
/tdaivam prathyuttharamarulli
/tmesremkaarude daasyatthi-
Nnisraayelyare rakshippaan
Vadiyum adhikaaravumeki.

Maanyidumeepraathakkaala
Tthan naathhaa! Krpacheyyaname
Akshayamaam praathakkaale
Nirtthaname valamaayivare

Anpudayone! Ninnarayee-
Nnanpum mochanavum nedaan
Lokam raavile ninkrpayin
Vaathilkkal muttunnaadyam

Naall muzhuvan ninrakshaykkaayu
Marthyasnehi nyaan paartthu
Ninvaravin vanpulariyathil
Nyangalle nirtthaname valamaay

Saitthilayum peritthirike
Nohingkal praavetthiyapol
Kaarunyam neditthirike
Nyangade yaachana cheratte

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
